Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Sting, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 13 Piercing plus 17 Poison, Can Posion hit target
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Hooked Polearm, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 17 Piercing, Can Grapple Huge or smaller creatures

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Devil makes 3 attacks, two with its Claws and one with its Sting.  Alternatively, the Devil makes 2 attacks, one with its Hooked Polearm and one with its Sting

Abilities.Ability 1: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
